name: SCLinkPreview
summary:
SCLinkPreview is common libraries providing APIs for:
1. Extracting and fetching Web Link meta for preparing Custom Link previews.
2. Adding Common Link previews to UIView.
It includes a cache to store LinkMeta data, enabling default.
description: A library for link preview functionality in iOS, offering APIs for extracting and fetching web link metadata. It supports custom link previews and provides a default cache for storing LinkMeta data.
